attributes.additional_details: Just to help their people out just by reducing the vat or putting a price cap on all fuels, some family's won't be able to afford to get to work soon.
attributes.background: With the cost of gas electricity and everything else going up, it is not getting harder for a lot of families to keep the head above water. And the fuel prices have sky rocked the past few weeks/days l.

rejection.details:
The Government is not directly responsible for the price of fuel, but we have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Reduce fuel duty and VAT by 40% for a period of 2 years: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/599089

Remove VAT from all domestic fuel, and provide price capping on heating oil: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/598647

Temporarily suspend all taxes on all fuels and energy bills: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/610585

Fund payments to energy customers to cover price rises by taxing oil companies: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/608136

Cut the VAT charged on energy bills: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/597470

Tax 50% of the Energy Companies profits to help households pay bills: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/607983
